Question: Grepow Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Grepow Inc.

Ultra-Narrow Lithium-Ion Batteries
- Innovative technology for higher performance, quality, and reliability
- 6mm ultra-narrow width, customizable for various electronic devices
- Ideal for wearable devices, maximizing internal space and providing greater capacity

Curved Shaped Battery
- Utilized in wearable devices for greater capacity and longer usage time
- Customizable to fit different electronic products

Round LiPo Batteries
- Stable working voltage and capacity
- Option for ready-made or customized batteries

High-Rate NiMH Batteries
- High-power discharge, long life, and low self-discharge
- Widely used in high-current discharge applications

Low-Temperature LiFePO4 Battery
- Excellent performance at -45℃, stable and longer cycle life
- Suitable for high-power UPS, power sport starting battery, and performance racing vehicle battery applications

24V LiFePO4 50000mAh Modular Battery
- High rate, small size, lightweight, and durable
- Support for flexible customization and efficient battery management

-50℃ Lithium-ion Button Cell Battery
- Designed for low-temperature applications
- Suitable for trackers, small GPS, sensors in aerospace, and polar research

Rechargeable Button Battery
- Low IR, good rate performance, high discharge-platform voltage, and long battery cycle life
- Widely used in various fields

Tattu Plus Smart Drone Battery Pack
- Available in different voltage and discharge rate options
- Suitable for agricultural plant protection, security mapping, and power inspection industries
Summary_cn:
格普威科技有限公司。

超窄锂离子电池
- 创新技术，提供更高的性能、质量和可靠性
- 6mm超窄宽度，可为各种电子设备定制
- 特别适用于可穿戴设备，最大化内部空间，提供更大容量

弧形电池
- 可用于可穿戴设备，提供更大容量和更长的使用时间
- 可定制以适应不同的电子产品

圆形锂聚合物电池
- 工作电压稳定，容量可靠
- 提供现成或定制的电池选项

高倍率镍氢电池
- 高功率放电，长寿命，低自放电
- 广泛应用于高电流放电应用中

低温锂铁磷酸电池
- 在-45℃下性能优越，稳定，循环寿命更长
- 适用于高功率不间断电源、动力运动起动电池和竞赛用车电池等应用

24V锂铁磷酸模块电池，容量50000mAh
- 高倍率、小尺寸、轻便耐用
- 支持灵活定制和高效的电池管理

-50℃锂离子钮扣电池
- 专为低温应用而设计
- 适用于追踪器、小型GPS、航空航天和极地研究等传感器

可充电钮扣电池
- 低内阻，良好的倍率性能，高放电平台电压和长电池循环寿命
- 广泛应用于各个领域

Tattu Plus智能无人机电池组
- 提供不同电压和放电倍率的选择
- 适用于农业植保、安全测绘和电力检查等行业
